column4: The media player program does not want to play mp3 files. What do I do?
Music Player that comes with Ubuntu
see above, the message from ubotu
Message: There were no decoders found to handle the stream in file... etc
mp3 is a proprietary format. it is not packaged on the cd because of this.
oh okay. Didnt know mp3 is proprietary
I got this file: xmms-1.2.10-1.i386 but I dont know what to do with it
Can't I just download an installer and run it?
you could download the xmms source code and compile it yourself
you only download what you need to update. nowhere near 700mb
Will that continue until v8 and 9 etc?
just - 1) Download the gutsy iso image 2) Burn it to disc 3) Do a clean install
